title: The Cronycles of Englonde with the dedes of popes and emperours, and also the descripcyon of Englonde
author: Higden, Ranulf, d. 1364. Polycronicon.
publicationDate: the yere of our lorde god M.CCCCC. et xxviij. the .ix. daye of Apryll] [1528]
publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the Sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,
notes: Known as "the Saint Albans chronicle"; not the same compilation as the "Chronicles of England" first printed by Caxton (STC 9991-4).
Includes "The descripcyon of Englonde", an excerpt from Higden, Ranulf.   Polycronicon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
